sentences: This contact group met to consider streamlining the review of reporting due from Kyoto Protocol Parties in 2006-2007.
The US emphasized the need to keep Convention and Protocol issues separate.
Delegates agreed to discuss national communications required under the Convention separately from reporting required under the Kyoto Protocol and to draft two separate decisions on these issues.
enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
